author: Matt Stieb
title: U.S. Now Has the World’s Largest Coronavirus Outbreak
description: Unfortunately, we’re No. 1. On Thursday, the number of U.S. coronavirus cases — at least 82,177 — surpassed China’s 81,285.
content:
